alert.note: Alert for Calvert; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 16 at 6:37AM EDT until July 16 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southern Maryland, including the following areas: Calvert and St. Marys. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Numerous showers and thunderstorms are possible across the warned area through this afternoon. Storms will be capable of producing heavy rainfall, with additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches possible. Locally higher amounts are also possible. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
